text: John Granville may refer to: * John Granville (diplomat), American diplomat assassinated in Khartoum, Sudan * John Granville, 1st Earl of Bath, English Royalist soldier and statesman * John Granville, 1st Baron Granville of Potheridge, English soldier, landowner and politician * John Granville (soccer), football goalkeeper from Trinidad & Tobago
title: John Granville
